body_html:
In case it helps, one way to achieve a version requirement only
under certain conditions is as follows:

cmake_minimum_required (VERSION )

if (<need higher version condition (e.g., is Windows)> AND
"${CMAKE_MAJOR_VERSION} and "${CMAKE_MINOR_VERSION}" are too low)
message( FATAL_ERROR "require version if " )
endif()
body_text:
In case it helps, one way to achieve a version requirement only
under certain conditions is as follows:
cmake_minimum_required (VERSION )
if (<need higher version condition (e.g., is Windows)>     AND
"${CMAKE_MAJOR_VERSION} and "${CMAKE_MINOR_VERSION}" are too low)
message( FATAL_ERROR "require version  if " )
endif()
body:
In case it helps, one way to achieve a version requirement only 
under certain conditions is as follows:

cmake_minimum_required (VERSION <minimum required under any circumstances>)

if (<need higher version condition (e.g., is Windows)>     AND
    "${CMAKE_MAJOR_VERSION} and "${CMAKE_MINOR_VERSION}" are too low) 
   message( FATAL_ERROR "require version <minimum version> if <need higher version condition>" )
endif()
